actions.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Financial Services.
On agreeing to the Financial Services amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting that such Housing Authority or other manager shall prevent a household from occupying such a dwelling unit, and shall provide priority for occupancy in such dwelling units.
purpose: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting that such Housing Authority or other manager shall prevent a household from occupying such a dwelling unit, and shall provide priority for occupancy in such dwelling units.
